00057 char file_add(const string &in_fn, const char *rm) {
00058     ipfstream in(in_fn.c_str());
00059     bool enoent = false;
00060     if( ! in ) {
00061             if( errno != ENOENT ) return 111; 
00062             enoent = true;
00063     }
00064     string out_fn(in_fn+'.'+uniq());
00065     opfstream out(out_fn.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00066     if( ! out ) return 111;
00067     
00068     string ln, lncmp(*rm ? rm : "");
00069     if( ! enoent ) {
00070             while(getline(in, ln)) {
00071                     if(ln == lncmp) {
00072                             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00073                             return 1;
00074                     }
00075                     out<<ln<<endl;
00076                     if( ! out ) {
00077                             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00078                             return 111;
00079                     }
00080             }
00081             if( in.bad() ) {
00082                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00083                     return 111;
00084             }
00085     }
00086     out<<lncmp<<endl;
00087     out.close();
00088     if( ! out ) {
00089             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00090             return 111;
00091     }
00092     
00093     if( ! enoent ) {
00094             struct stat st;
00095             if( fstat(in.rdbuf()->fd(), &st)
00096                 || chown(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_uid, st.st_gid)
00097                 || chmod(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_mode & 07777) ) {
00098                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00099                     return 111;
00100             }
00101     } else if( chmod(out_fn.c_str(), ac_qmail_mode.val_int()) ) {
00102             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00103             return 111;
00104     }
00105             
00106     return rename(out_fn.c_str(), in_fn.c_str()) ? 111 : 0;
00107 }

00109 int main( int ac , char ** av ) {
00110         try {
00111                 if( ac != 3 ) {
00112                         cerr<<"usage: "<<*av<<" file's_code line_to_add"<<endl
00113                             <<"Program adds a line to specified file."<<endl
00114                             <<"Does not add if file include given line."<<endl
00115                             <<"Program returns 0 on success, 1 if file was not changed,"<<endl
00116                             <<"anything else on error."<<endl
00117                             <<"Files codes are set up during compilation in qmail_files.h"<<endl;
00118                         return 2;
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 string fn(ac_qmail.val_str()+'/'
00122                     +qf2file(static_cast<qmail_file>(*av[1])));
00123 
00124                 opfstream lck((fn+".lock").c_str());
00125                 if( ! lck ) return 3;
00126         
00127                 if( lock_exnb(lck.rdbuf()->fd()) ) return 4;
00128     
00129                 return file_add(fn, av[2]);
00130         } catch(...) {
00131                 return 111;
00132         }
00133 }
